Package student.controller

Class CarRentalGUIController

java.lang.Object
student.controller.CarRentalGUIController
All Implemented Interfaces:
CarRentalControllerInterface
public class CarRentalGUIController extends Object implements CarRentalControllerInterface
Controller class for handling GUI-based interactions in the Car Rental System.

This controller coordinates user actions triggered from the GUI (e.g., button clicks, dialogs) with underlying business logic provided by service classes.

  • Constructor Details

    • CarRentalGUIController

      public CarRentalGUIController(CarService carService, CarBookingService bookingService, UserService userService, CarRentalGUIView guiView)
      Constructs a GUI controller with required service and view components.
      Parameters:
      carService - The service for car-related operations.
      bookingService - The service for booking-related operations.
      userService - The service for user account operations.
      guiView - The GUI view for user interaction.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Launches the GUI application. Sets the controller as event listener and makes the GUI visible.
